text: She's a young entreprenuer with a cosmetics empire quickly blossoming. But Kylie Jenner seeks a little more security in her love life while visiting a Peruvian shaman in a clip for the season finale of her hit show Life Of Kylie. The 20 - year - old reality television personality brings her mother Kris Jenner and best friend Jordyn Wood along to meet with a shaman and ask him questions about their personal lives.
